name: Wizards Save The Earth
description:
A small local multiplayer game I've made about two wizards competing who is going to save the earth better after the apocalypse. Each one of them has a magical slot machine.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls: 

--- Player 1 ---

Move - ASD (left, down, right)

Jump - V

Plant Flower - B

Fireball - V

--- Player 2 --- 

Move - right, down, left (arrows)

Jump - M

Plant Flower - N

Fireball - L

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Jump on Your magical slot machine, get fireballs/flowers, use all of them and go get more. Plant more flowers than Your friend to save the earth better by the time ends :)
